paratext: There are many to whom the following exquisite poem, by Mrs. Howe, the gifted authorette of "Passion Flowers,"  will seem like an echo from their own heart. 'T is said "The Last love is the best"  but still the heart-thoughts but still the heart will wander back to the time long-ago. The happiest of life.
author: Mrs. Howe
title: None

paratext: There are many to whom the following exquisite poem, by Mrs. Howe, the gifted authoress of "Passion Flowers,"  seems the genuine utterance of a woman's  soul--earnest, tender, sadly sweet---there is truth in it that many wives and mothers will feel:
author: Mrs. Howe
title: First Love
